abstract: Apple and Facebook have much in common, and a lot could come from collaboration between the two - if they could just find a way to meet.
snippet: Apple and Facebook have much in common, and a lot could come from collaboration between the two - if they could just find a way to meet.
lead_paragraph: I'd like to make an introduction: Apple, please meet Facebook. Facebook, meet Apple.

headline.main: Apple, Meet Facebook. Facebook, Meet Apple.
